Text: If this is from a "bluray" its the most pixelated production I've ever seen.

@ Mathlol
Dude, this movie was made in 1997. Bluray isn't a cure-all way of making the world all rainbows and sunshine. The movie looks perfectly fine, and it's the best quality out there. Downloads fast too at 1.0 MB/s, considering there aren't that many seeders.. Thank you for the download aoloffline.
